concept.title: Personal Information in MyPack Portal
concept.shortdesc: You can view and edit personal information on the Personal Information tile in MyPack Portal.

conbody.p: The MyPack Portal allows you to view and update certain personal information. This information includes:

ul.li: Personal details (student ID number, name, and preferred name)

conbody.p: Providing accurate personal information helps ensure that you receive important notifications and updates regarding your account.
